patthana15.11:4.1: Hetuṃ sekkhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nasekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
patthana15.11:5.1: Hetuṃ asekkhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naasekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
patthana15.11:6.1: Nahetuṃ nevasekkhanāsekkhaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nanahetu nanevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
